slides.title: Meet the candidate of the 633 Teamsters Power Slate (link)
slides.description: The guys have kicked off their campaign!

slides.title: The Power Slate Meets IBT General President Sean O'Brien
slides.description: Candidates of the Power Slate met up with Sean O'Brien earlier this year.

slides.title: Power Slate Candidates meet with members of Local 633 at UPS in Dover
slides.description: Power Slate candidates have begun making the rounds to get the word out. Check out the news and events pages for more information.

slides.title: Power Slate Candidates meet with the few year-round Local 633 members at First Student in Keene.
slides.description: Despite only a few members working at First Student full-time throughout the summer, the Power Slate shows up for everyone.

slides.title: Congratulations to one of the winners of the 633 Power Slate raffle!
slides.description: Jerry won a Blackstone Griddle during our first raffle to help raise money for our campign. Thank you to everyone who participated and helped us kick off our campaign. Stay tuned for more from the Power Slate!

slides.title: Power Slate Candidates continue to meet with members of Local 633 at Keene State College in Keene
slides.description: Power Slate candidates have been making the rounds to get the word out. Continue following as they make their way throughout the state.
